title: Update NuGet and Roslyn versions
body:
The version of Arcade MSBuild currently uses uses Roslyn version 3.3.1. This updates that, but it should be removed when we've updated to a more modern version of arcade.

Also updates our version of NuGet.

commit.message:
Update versions

The version of Arcade MSBuild currently uses uses Roslyn version 3.3.1. This updates that, but it should be removed when we've updated to a more modern version of arcade.

nodes.body: I think we should let this get superseded by #5920 and #5921 (the darc-driven updates enabled by #5909).
Do we need to bring those in with #5910? I saw something wasn't found, and it was looking in the netcoreapp2.1 folder.
@Forgind Ben already fixed that in his Arcade update branch so let's just port that fix.
